title.narrative: Pakistan (le): Aide ciblée aux pays
Pakistan: Targeted country assistance

description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Pakistan (le), grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Pakistan (le) ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in Pakistan through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of Pakistan, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

title.narrative: CDC Foundation

Development of Communications and Surveillance materials, including crisis and risk communication plans. Development of Vaccine Related Event response plan. Training of Federal and Provincial level staff on the VRE plan.

target.value: Adequate and timely response to vaccine related events (VREs) is critical to restoring public trust in vaccines and mitigating long-term impact on the immunization system. Pakistan is particularly vulnerable to VREs due to its weak routine immunization infrastructure. We aim to support Pakistan in the development of a high quality vaccine related event plan, consisting of 4 phases. 1 ? Assessment of AEFI system 2 ? Assessment of communication and surveillance around vaccine related events 3 ? Development of communications and surveillance materials. Identify where more work is needed to be done 4 ? Develop a Vaccine Related Event Response Plan 5 - Training of Federal and Provincial level staff on the VRE plan.

title.narrative: Final report on TCV planning, implementation and lessons learned from Gavi TCV implementation. Final reports of technical assistance for monitoring and evaluation activities.

target.value: Provide technical assistance for Gavi supported TCV introduction approved for Pakistan. Work in collaboration with the MOH and other keep partners for planning and evaluation of the first phase of the introduction in 2019. TCV introduction in Pakistan is especially important to document given the occurence of the extensively drug resistant typhoid outbreak.

title.narrative: Initial report on technical assistance for planning and implementation of the campaign.

target.value: Provide technical assistance for the first Gavi-supported Typhoid Gavi supported TCV introduction in Pakistan (approved Gavi application). Work in collaboration with the MOH, WHO and other partners (Aga Khan University) for planning and evaluation of the introduction in 2019 and 2020. CDC will be a key technical partner for AKU for evaluation of the TCV campaign over 3 - 4 years (CDC-HQ activities planned through TCA funds and will responsible for close coordination between the CDC in-country staff and other partners). TCV introduction in Pakistan is especially important to document given the occurence of the extensively drug resistant typhoid outbreak and impact of TCV on XRD outbreak control will be critical.

title.narrative: CDC Foundation : Vaccine-Specific Support
Report on disease surveillance and impact evaluation activities. Final report on campaign coverage.

target.value: Provide technical assistance for the first Gavi-supported Typhoid Gavi supported TCV introduction in Pakistan (approved Gavi application). Work in collaboration with the MOH, WHO and other partners (Aga Khan University) for planning and evaluation of the introduction in 2019 and 2020. CDC will be a key technical partner for AKU for evaluation of the TCV campaign over 3 - 4 years (CDC-HQ activities planned through TCA funds and will responsible for close coordination between the CDC in-country staff and other partners). TCV introduction in Pakistan is especially important to document given the occurence of the extensively drug resistant typhoid outbreak and impact of TCV on XRD outbreak control will be critical.

title.narrative: UNICEF : Service Delivery
Documented knowledge products,Case studies, lesson learned, best practices and human interest stories.

target.value: Provide technical assistance for HSS through immunization system strengthening, and PHC for UHC ; determine the focus, strategies and monitor the implementation, to increase vaccine uptake in urban poor populations with the highest level of inequities.

title.narrative: Documented progress on equitable delivery of immunization services at all levels (Provincial,District,Facility and Community level).

target.value:
"Advocacy, planning and implementation of agreed strategies (Equity led implementation in urban poor and remote rural, ISD (DCP3 package) in SHRUCs). Monitor and measure program implementation, rational use of funding, timely reporting. The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

title.narrative: "1. Provinces are efficiently guided and coordinated for urban immunization action plans, and implementation. 2. Documented progress of the implementation of action plans in targetted districts and mega cities. 3. Support provided to the development of Gavi full portfolio/HSS-III planning."

target.value: Provide technical assistance for HSS through immunization system strengthening, and PHC for UHC ; determine the focus, strategies and monitor the implementation, to increase vaccine uptake in urban poor populations with the highest level of inequities.

title.narrative: Timely planning and implementation of Immunization strategies to reach missed children, Documented progress on implementation of EPI action plans to reach children with vaccines in targetted districts.

target.value:
"Advocacy, planning and implementation of agreed strategies (Equity led implementation in urban poor and remote rural, ISD (DCP3 package) in SHRUCs). Monitor and measure program implementation, rational use of funding, timely reporting. The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

title.narrative: World Bank : Health Financing/Sustainability
Roadmap to improve financial sustainability discussed with government

target.value: Gavi funds over the past few years were used to provide technical assistance to the federal and provincial governments of Pakistan to enhance capacity for health accounting (through the immunization accounts which includes off-budget) and expenditure tracking to ensure that immunization funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner. With TCA 2020, the World Bank will focus on the financial sustainability of immunization financing with GAVI transitioning and strenthening controls and accountability to ensure that funds are used for purpose intended. This work will build upon findings of the WB?s work on analytics assessing the control assessment and financial sustainability and efficiency of immunization financing expected to be completed by March 2020.

Gavi funds over the past few years were used to provide technical assistance to the federal and provincial governments of Pakistan to enhance capacity for health accounting (through the immunization accounts which includes off-budget) and expenditure tracking to ensure that immunization funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner. With TCA 2020, the World Bank will focus on the financial sustainability of immunization financing with GAVI transitioning and strenthening controls and accountability to ensure that funds are used for purpose intended. This work will build upon findings of the WB?s work on analytics assessing the control assessment and financial sustainability and efficiency of immunization financing expected to be completed by March 2020.

title.narrative: Methodology to implement actions identified in the roadmap.

target.value: Gavi funds over the past few years were used to provide technical assistance to the federal and provincial governments of Pakistan to enhance capacity for health accounting (through the immunization accounts which includes off-budget) and expenditure tracking to ensure that immunization funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner. With TCA 2020, the World Bank will focus on the financial sustainability of immunization financing with GAVI transitioning and strenthening controls and accountability to ensure that funds are used for purpose intended. This work will build upon findings of the WB?s work on analytics assessing the control assessment and financial sustainability and efficiency of immunization financing expected to be completed by March 2020.

title.narrative: Dissemination of WB?s report "Towards sustainable financing of routine immunization in Pakistan: A Financial Analysis"

target.value: Gavi funds over the past few years were used to provide technical assistance to the federal and provincial governments of Pakistan to enhance capacity for health accounting (through the immunization accounts which includes off-budget) and expenditure tracking to ensure that immunization funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner. With TCA 2021, the World Bank will focus on i) improving budget autonomy and expenditure efficiency at the primary health centers for integrated health services, ii) strengthening internal control at the primary health centers, including asset management and iii) Dissemination of WB?s report "Towards sustainable financing of routine immunization in Pakistan: A Financial Analysis", funded with NISP BETF/Gavi TCA funds. Budget execution issues highlighted in the report, especially between federal and provincial levels will also be explored further to provide practical recommendations taken forward through TA to the Government within country engagement.

title.narrative: Bottlenecks to primary health services-related budget/funds flow to sub-national/specific geographic areas identified.

target.value: Gavi funds over the past few years were used to provide technical assistance to the federal and provincial governments of Pakistan to enhance capacity for health accounting (through the immunization accounts which includes off-budget) and expenditure tracking to ensure that immunization funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner. With TCA 2021, the World Bank will focus on i) improving budget autonomy and expenditure efficiency at the primary health centers for integrated health services, ii) strengthening internal control at the primary health centers, including asset management and iii) Dissemination of WB?s report "Towards sustainable financing of routine immunization in Pakistan: A Financial Analysis", funded with NISP BETF/Gavi TCA funds. Budget execution issues highlighted in the report, especially between federal and provincial levels will also be explored further to provide practical recommendations taken forward through TA to the Government within country engagement.

title.narrative: UNICEF : Programme Implementation/Coverage & Equity
Integrated health service delivery action plans implemented in identified low performing districts including targetted mega cities to increase routine immunization coverage.

target.value: Provide technical assistance in the planning, development, implementation and monitoring of integrated Immunization/health strategies including EPI/PEI synergy. Strengthen coordination and partenerships with key stakeholders to reach missed and underserved children with immunization and basic PHC services through immunization system strengtheing.

Provide technical assistance in the planning, development, implementation and monitoring of integrated Immunization/health strategies including EPI/PEI synergy. Strengthen coordination and partenerships with key stakeholders to reach missed and underserved children with immunization and basic PHC services through immunization system strengtheing.

target.value: Provide technical assistance to the planning, development, implementation and monitoring of integrated immunization/health action plans in all targeted districts including urban settings including Quetta City and polio super highrisk union councils to ensure universal immunization coverage.

Provide technical assistance to the planning, development, implementation and monitoring of integrated immunization/health action plans in all targeted districts including urban settings including Quetta City and polio super highrisk union councils to ensure universal immunization coverage.

title.narrative: UNICEF : Supply Chain & Procurement

(1) Integrated 600 CCE with RTMDs.
(2) Documented cold chain equioment optamization plan (CCEOP) implementation and progress on establishment of CCE maintenance infrastructure

target.value: Support the functionality and strenghtening of the Federal and Provincial immunization supply chain systems at all levels
Support the functionality and strenghtening of the Federal and Provincial immunization supply chain systems at all levels

title.narrative: UNICEF : Data
Documented progress on implementation of costed action plans to reach children with vaccines in targetted districts.

target.value:
"Advocacy, synergistic approaches with other sectors and within health Support immunization program focus on missed children of Balochistan (urban poor in megacities, remote rural populations), as well as ISD/ synergy activities (implementation of DCP3 pakage in 18 SHRUCS). Provide Technical assistance for hard to reach areas due to insecurity and terrain by using experience in other countries that has helped reduce inequalities for marginalized population. More specifically work with the Government, WHO, local communities and organization in planning and delivery of services tailored to specific areas. By combining intergration with Nutrition and other services, provide services that will improve the uptake of RI and reduce zero dose as well as bring health services to communities. Support the establishment of mobile health to hard to reach areas and make sure that remote and hard to reach communities are reached with services. The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring the EPI specialist, the urban consultant, the ISD consultant, cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

title.narrative: Progress reports are available to inform immuization programming

target.value:
"Monitor program implementation results to guide further programming: regular data collection and analysis, including with CSOs to report for UNICEF. Knowledge management
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as
they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

"Monitor program implementation results to guide further programming: regular data collection and analysis, including with CSOs to report for UNICEF. Knowledge management
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as
they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

title.narrative: Timely planning and implementation of Immunization strategies to reach missed children, in Balochistan. Documented progress on implementation of EPI action plans to reach children with vaccines in targetted districts.

target.value:
"Advocacy, synergistic approaches with other sectors and within health Support immunization program focus on missed children of Balochistan (urban poor in megacities, remote rural populations), as well as ISD/ synergy activities (implementation of DCP3 pakage in 18 SHRUCS). Provide Technical assistance for hard to reach areas due to insecurity and terrain by using experience in other countries that has helped reduce inequalities for marginalized population. More specifically work with the Government, WHO, local communities and organization in planning and delivery of services tailored to specific areas. By combining intergration with Nutrition and other services, provide services that will improve the uptake of RI and reduce zero dose as well as bring health services to communities. Support the establishment of mobile health to hard to reach areas and make sure that remote and hard to reach communities are reached with services. The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring the EPI specialist, the urban consultant, the ISD consultant, cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

title.narrative: UNICEF : Supply chain

(1) Integrated 600 CCE with RTMDs.
(2) Documented cold chain equioment optamization plan (CCEOP) implementation and progress on establishment of CCE maintenance infrastructure

target.value:
"Develop an immunization supply chain, Management Information System for vaccine and cold chain, conduct cold chain assessments and bottleneck analysis, develop training module, contribute to cold chain assessment for new vaccine introduction and mass immunization campaign. Contribute EVM and improvement plans, develop EPI supply chain road map
The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH"

title.narrative:
(1) Developed plans and framework for year 3 Operational Deployment Plan (ODP) for Cold Chain Equipment ( CCE)
(2) Completed EVM assessment report and Costed Improvement Plan (cIP).

title.narrative: UNICEF : Demand Promotion & ACSM
Documentation of demand generation activities for integrated services and new vaccine introductions in Pakistan.

target.value:
"Provide technical support in coordinating Human Centered Design (UCD) approaches to enhance community engagement interventions with PEI program, expanded partners and CSOs network to identify and refer missed/zero dose children for vaccination and create demand for immunization/integrated services in high risk, hard to reach areas and mega cities, including urban slums.
The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
Staff member will spend all required time to respond to FEPI and PEPI specific requests, support EPI program management (funding and results) in areas allocated to UNICEF and attend meetings as they are conveyed at national and subnational level (following UNICEF rules and regulations). The relocation of the staff to Gov structure will have to be discussed between UNICEF management and MoH "
Work in close coordination with EPI-PEI program and expanded parteners for integrated services around demand generation in high risk, hard to reach and targetted mega cities including urban slums.
Work in close coordination with EPI-PEI program and expanded parteners for integrated services around demand generation in high risk, hard to reach and targetted mega cities including urban slums.

title.narrative:
"Human Centered Design (UCD) approaches from the National Demand Roadmap Workshop used for planning evidence based community engagement interventions to reach children with essential immunization/health services through district specifc plans for the 46 priority districts under HSS-II.
Monthly Social Listening Analysis Reports around digital media to track, assess and address misinformation and rumors on immunisation as well as COVID-19
"

The staff member is also the focal point for COVID 19 vaccine roll out and monitoring appropriate planning and implementation, through monitoring cold chain and C4D specialists at subnational level
